channel.title: Trouble Compiling
channel.description:
Im having trouble with the SRL. I put everything in my scar folder but when I compile says
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Users.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Math.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\misc\Conversions.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Timing.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\MouseFlag.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Text.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\GameTab.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\DTM.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Color.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\BitMap.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Symbol.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Login.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Object.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Inventory.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AutoTalk.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\MapWalk.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiRandoms.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiBan.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Bank.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
